oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ribbon cutting for the American Airlines office at Sixth Avenue, Nashville, Tennessee, 1958 March
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The ribbon cutting ceremony for the American Airlines office located at 239 Sixth Avenue, in downtown Nashville, Tennessee. Among the officials are the Aviation Commission members. This business office was located in the same building as the Hermitage Hotel. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 4 photograph negatives : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: American Airlines, inc.
